nodes.text: Ryan Odagawa (born November 15, 1975) is a comic book artist who pencilled the Free Comic Book Day 2013 one-shot Star Wars: The Assassination of Darth Vader written by Brian Wood and published by Dark Horse Comics.

He is best known for his work on the Heroes Online Graphic Novel and Alias Comics' miniseries TwinBlades. Odagawa also worked as a texture artist on several video games, such as Medal of Honor: Frontline and Command & Conquer: Generals, and played a Japanese soldier in Clint Eastwood's film Letters from Iwo Jima.
